3.name: Frenzy
3.description: While raging, you can enter a frenzy. For the duration of the rage you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action on each turn after this one. When the rage ends, you suffer one level of exhaustion.

6.name: Mindless Rage
6.description: You can't be charmed or frightened while raging. If you are charmed or frightened when you enter your rage, the effect is suspended for the duration of the rage.

10.name: Intimidating Presence
10.description: You can use your action to frighten one creature within 30 feet that can see or hear you. The target must succeed on a Wisdom save or be frightened until the end of your next turn. You can use your action on subsequent turns to extend the effect.

14.name: Retaliation
14.description: When you take damage from a creature within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature.
